items.title: There’s a New Heated Rivalry Book Coming Out This Year
items.description: Get ready for more Heated Rivalry (!), the NCAA's book donations, and *the* prettiest libraries. Plus, the most popular books on Libby.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for January 12, 2026
items.description: A Depression era circus, a terrifying new breed of vampires, a disastrous date, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: 37 of the Most Anticipated BIPOC Books of 2026
items.description: There's Cleopatra's story, the last book in Colson Whitehead's trilogy, a book with weird girl vibes, poetry by Hanif Abdurraqib, and lots more.

items.title: Lost and Found: Eight Books about Lost Books and Manuscripts
items.description: There's nothing quite like a book about lost books! These 8 fiction books explore stories about lost books and manuscripts.

items.title: 9 of the Best YA Romance Authors
items.description: These YA romance authors represent some of the strongest voices in the genre, with memorable characters and emotionally grounded storytelling.
